partnerDetails.about:
Pima Controls Private Limited is an ISO 9001:2015 Certified professionally managed Company focused on Distribution and Supply of Industrial Automation and Electrical Products and Services, partnering with world renowned quality companies since 1986.

Pima has been a pioneer supplier in Industrial Automation in Western India and is today recognised as a market leader. Process Instrumention Monitoring and Automation (PIMA) has consistently offered hi-tech solutions, application assistance and exceptional customer service to our customers enabling us to create a large portfolio of dedicated and loyal customers.

Our customer portfolio includes End Users, Original Equipment Manufacturers, Systems Integrators, Turnkey Contractors, Panel Builders and Consultants. With our large experience we understand the needs of each segment and give personalized service and support.
